name: Aireon LLC
description: Aireon LLC is a global leader in space-based air traffic surveillance, dedicated to enhancing aviation safety and efficiency. Founded in 2011, Aireon is a joint venture comprising several major air navigation service providers. The company operates the world’s first satellite-based automatic dependent surveillance-broadcast (ADS-B) system, providing real-time tracking of aircraft over oceans and remote areas where traditional radar coverage is unavailable. By utilizing a network of satellites, Aireon delivers accurate and timely data to air traffic control centers, allowing for improved situational awareness and operational efficiency. The system enhances safety by enabling better tracking of aircraft and reducing the risk of mid-air collisions. Aireon’s innovative technology is transforming air traffic management, enabling a more connected and efficient global aviation network. The company is also focused on integrating its services into existing aviation infrastructures, promoting seamless cooperation between air traffic controllers and airlines. Aireon’s mission is to support the aviation industry by delivering reliable surveillance solutions that enhance safety, efficiency, and environmental sustainability. With a commitment to technological advancement, Aireon continues to expand its services and partnerships, playing a crucial role in the modernization of air traffic management worldwide.
